search_strategy.label: Machine Learning for Wildfire Detection using Sentinel-2 - Literature Search
search_strategy.methodology_notes: Search strategy for systematic review on machine learning algorithms applied to Sentinel-2 imagery for wildfire applications. Boolean operators: (Sentinel-2 OR Sentinel-2 data) AND (wildfire OR forest fire OR burned area) AND (machine learning OR deep learning OR artificial neural network OR random forest). Date restriction: June 2015-present (Sentinel-2A launch: 23 June 2015). Language: English only. Database selection: OpenAlex (comprehensive coverage, free API), arXiv (preprints in cs.CV, cs.LG, eess.IV), Semantic Scholar (AI-enhanced discovery, free API). Exclusions: conference abstracts without full methodology, reviews without original experiments, studies using only MODIS/Landsat without Sentinel-2. Citation tracking: backward/forward citation analysis of included papers using Semantic Scholar and OpenAlex APIs.
